headline: Coterra Energy (CTRA) Rated as an ‘Overweight’ at Goldman Sachs despite Shale Challenges
summary: Coterra Energy Inc. (NYSE:CTRA) is one of Goldman Sachs’ top energy stock picks. On June 25, JPMorgan reiterated an Overweight rating on the stock. The stance comes as the energy continues to address production challenges at its shale operations. The investment bank also hiked its price target to $34 from $32. The company had reported […]
